p: Both infectious and non-infectious (chemically induced) reliable models were used to evaluate the anti-diarrheal potential of Eriosema species in vivo. However, from five species traditionally claimed to be anti-diarrheal ( E. affine, E. chinense, E. griseum, E. psoraleoides and E. tuberosum), only the ethanolic root extract of E. chinense and compounds 39 and 81 were investigated, indicating that in the Eriosema genus this domain is underexplored. Given the promising results obtained with one extract, it would be interesting to extend the exploration to the other Eriosema species traditionally used against diarrhea.
